description: React component for switching between organizations, including loading orgs, selecting, and creating new ones; manages state and UI interactions related to org switching.

methods.name: OrgSwitcher
methods.description: React functional component providing UI to switch organizations.

methods.name: loadOrgs
methods.description: Fetches list of organizations from API and sets the current organization based on local storage or defaults.

methods.name: selectOrg
methods.description: Sets the selected organization and updates local storage, then reloads the page.
